actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a program of providing for research, treatment, and public education with respect to Lyme disease.
short_title: Lyme Disease Research and Education Act of 1990

summary.text: Lyme Disease Research and Education Act of 1990 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services, acting through the Director of the Centers for Disease Control, to: (1) conduct research and provide treatment and public education regarding Lyme disease; and (2) make grants to public or nonprofit private entities for research, treatment, and public education regarding such disease. Authorizes appropriations for such activities from FY 1991 through 1993, with the stipulation that at least 50 percent of the funds appropriated be directed to the grant program.

titles.title: Lyme Disease Research and Education Act of 1990
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a program of providing for research, treatment, and public education with respect to Lyme disease.
